:py:mod:`~farabi.data.imgops` Module
=========================================================================

:py:mod:`~farabi.data.imgops` module provides a :py:class:`~farabi.data.imgops.ImgOps` class
containing basic interaction methods with image file.

Register module
-----------------

.. code-block:: python

    >>> import farabi.data.imgops.ImgOps as ImgOps
    >>> img_path = './sample.jpg'

.. autoclass:: farabi.data.imgops.ImgOps
   :members:
   :exclude-members: __init__
